actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the deduction for depreciation shall be computed on a neutral cost recovery basis.

summary.text: Neutral Cost Recovery Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require that the depreciation deduction for tangible property placed in service after 2003 be computed using neutral cost recovery ratios.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the deduction for depreciation shall be computed on a neutral cost recovery basis.
